channel.title: CVE Feed for NetWin -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for NetWin -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-7209|2024-07-30T19:25:08.155Z -- netwin -- netwin
item.description: A vulnerability exists in the use of shared SPF records in multi-tenant hosting providers, allowing attackers to use network authorization to be abused to spoof the email identify of the sender.

item.description: A vulnerability exists in the use of shared SPF records in multi-tenant hosting providers, allowing attackers to use network authorization to be abused to spoof the email identify of the sender.
